about_the_game:
ABOUT

You play as an agent working for the A.M.C.A., you're tasked with monitoring places where unusual occurrences have been previously reported and report any abnormalities you spot on the cameras, as well as dealing with any entities that are deemed threats.

You will be sent to various locations, each with no less than 8 cameras to pay attention to, with more threats being introduced as you progress, until you finally reach where it all began.

Your shift lasts for 6 hours, from 12AM to 6AM (15 real life minutes), you must stay on edge throughout all 6 of these ours, otherwise, you'll face the consequences.

Failure to report all active anomalies will result in a 75% dock from your payment.

No breaks, and good luck, you'll need it.

FEATURES

  •  Finding and reporting anomalies using the cams. 

  •  Multiple threats on and off the cameras. 

  •  8 Levels (currently 5). 

  •  Challenges for each level. 

  •  Possibly a custom night for the final level. 

NOTES 

Monitor is inspired by I'm on Observation Duty and Five Nights at Freddy's.

Monitor has 5 levels only and will update over time, 1-2 levels each update.

I'm making this game completely solo. 

This game is my first release, I'm open for criticism.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD Ryzen 3 1300X or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A survival horror game where you defend yourself from threats while looking out for anomalies.
